modName: Gladius Imperial Sword and Scabbard RELOADED
summary: Retexture of the imperial one handed sword and scabbard to make it look like the official Gladius sword of the roman empire.
descriptionHtml:
A new HQ retexture of the imperial sword and scabbard to make it look like a real Gladius (Roman Imperium Official Sword)

Installation:
-UnRAR the content of the archive downloaded.
-Copy the \'Data\' file to your Skyrim directory.
-Play game and enjoy it!

Unistallation:
-Simply delete the file downloaded.

Hope you enjoy it!

Thanks to Startrooper55 for passing me such a nice screenshot ;)
author: Jargu Bulinguillo
